select t.`id`,t.`tag_name`,t.`hits`,t.`tag_index`,t.`status`,t.`deleted`,t.`creation_time`,t.`update_time`,COUNT(*) AS articles_num from tb_blog_tag AS t left join tb_blog AS b on t.`id` = b.`tag_id` where t.`deleted`=0 group by t.`id` order by t.`tag_index` desc
limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
